grails.plugin.cache.web
[Java] Class ProxyAwareMixedGrailsControllerHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractGrailsControllerHelper
      org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.servlet.mvc.MixedGrailsControllerHelper
          grails.plugin.cache.web.ProxyAwareMixedGrailsControllerHelper

public class ProxyAwareMixedGrailsControllerHelper
extends org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.servlet.mvc.MixedGrailsControllerHelper

The default implementation doesn't expect controllers to be proxied, and this causes action methods to be ignored. Registered as the "grailsControllerHelper" bean to replace the default.

Authors:
Burt Beckwith

ProxyAwareMixedGrailsControllerHelper()
